sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: JinkoSolar Achieves Rcord-Breaking 26.66% Efficiency for TOPCon Solar Cell Based on M10-size Wafer
feed.summary: JinkoSolar has achieved a new world record for industrial-scale TOPCon solar cell efficiency on M10-size wafers, reaching 26.66%. This breakthrough was verified by an independent third-party organization in China and developed with support from the Ningbo Institute of Materials Technology and Engineering and Soochow and Jiliang Universities. The company anticipates crossing the 28% efficiency threshold by 2028.

feed.title: Embraer unveils next-gen Praetor bizjets
feed.summary: Embraer has unveiled the next-generation Praetor 600E and Praetor 500E business jets, featuring fully reimagined cabins designed to maximize comfort and productivity on longer missions. Key enhancements include an industry-first 42-inch, 4K OLED touchscreen Smart Window with video conferencing capabilities, a new Cabin Management System, and re-engineered seating. These innovations aim to redefine the private flight experience and extend operational flexibilities.

feed.title: FCC v. AT&T, Inc.
feed.summary: The Liberty Justice Center has filed an amicus brief in the Supreme Court case FCC v. AT&T, Inc., arguing that the FCC should not be allowed to levy fines without a jury trial. They contend that the FCC's current process, where it acts as investigator, prosecutor, and judge for alleged data privacy violations, bypasses the Seventh Amendment right to a jury trial. The organization emphasizes that these legal fines, being punitive in nature, demand a jury's decision, aiming to protect constitutional rights against administrative overreach.

feed.title: Jefferies Sees Credit Karma Driving Potential Upside for Intuit Inc. (INTU)
feed.summary: Jefferies has reiterated a Buy rating on Intuit Inc. (INTU) and sees potential upside driven by Credit Karma, despite lowering its price target to $650 from $850. The firm expects solid fiscal Q2 results, anticipating favorable momentum among card issuers. Intuit also recently launched a "Done-For-You" TurboTax experience, combining Agentic AI with expert support to streamline tax preparation.

feed.title: GLOBE LIFE INC. DECLARES DIVIDEND AND ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF TWO NEW BOARD MEMBERS
feed.summary: Globe Life Inc. has declared a quarterly dividend increase to $0.3300 per share, payable on May 1, 2026. The company also announced the appointment of Derek T. Kan, Vice President of Business Operations at Shopify, Inc., and Sandra L. Phillips, Senior Vice President Enterprise Integrity, Chief Legal Officer, Corporate Secretary and Chief Sustainability Officer at Toyota Motor North America Inc., to its Board of Directors. These appointments bring valuable expertise in innovation, technology, financial oversight, regulatory matters, legal, and operational risk to the Board.

feed.title: Kratos Defense plans $1 billion stock offering
feed.summary: Kratos Defense & Security Solutions Inc. announced a $1 billion underwritten public offering of common stock, with underwriters having an option to purchase an additional $150 million in shares. The company intends to use the proceeds for acquisitions, investments in national security priorities, and general corporate purposes. While Kratos maintains a strong balance sheet, its stock is currently trading above InvestingPro's Fair Value estimate, suggesting it might be overvalued despite recent financial successes and analyst confidence.

feed.title: Albemarle declares quarterly dividend of $0.405 per share
feed.summary: Albemarle Corporation has announced a quarterly dividend of $0.405 per share, payable on April 1, 2026, to shareholders of record by March 13, 2026. The company's stock has seen significant growth, surging 158% over the past year. Recent developments include mixed Q4 2025 earnings and positive analyst outlooks despite challenges such as Zimbabwe's ban on raw lithium exports.

feed.title: Edison International Issues $550 Million Senior Notes Offering
feed.summary: Edison International (EIX) announced a $550 million offering of 4.80% Senior Notes due 2031, which will enhance its funding flexibility but also increase its long-term debt obligations. TipRanks' AI Analyst, Spark, rates EIX as Neutral, citing mixed financial quality and leverage uncertainty despite strong earnings and revenue trends, a low P/E, and a strong dividend yield. The company operates in the utilities and energy sector, frequently accessing capital markets to support its infrastructure and strategic initiatives.

feed.title: Fred Meyer, QFC parent company Kroger continues store closures nationwide
feed.summary: Kroger, the parent company of Fred Meyer and QFC, is proceeding with its plan to close dozens of underperforming stores nationwide. Announced in June, the company intends to shutter approximately 60 locations over 18 months, leading to some closures already and layoffs of corporate employees. While a full list hasn't been released, media reports confirm closures in various states.

feed.title: Is Strong Q4 Revenue And Steady Dividend Policy Altering The Investment Case For Viatris (VTRS)?
feed.summary: Viatris (VTRS) reported stronger-than-expected Q4 2025 revenue of US$3.7 billion despite a net loss, and affirmed its 2026 dividend policy of US$0.48 per share. The company is focusing on execution, cost savings, and advancing its ophthalmology pipeline. While the steady dividend and revenue guidance offer some reassurance, investors should consider the ongoing net losses and debt.

feed.title: Is It Time To Reassess Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) After Strong Multi‑Year Gains?
feed.summary: Public Service Enterprise Group (PEG) has experienced significant multi-year gains, with shares closing at US$85.97. A Dividend Discount Model suggests the stock is approximately 7.4% overvalued, while a Price-to-Earnings analysis indicates it is slightly undervalued compared to its "Fair Ratio" of 21.87x. The article encourages investors to use Simply Wall St's Narrative tool for personalized valuation assessments.

feed.title: Is Apollo Global Management (APO) Attractive Again After Recent Share Price Pullback?
feed.summary: Apollo Global Management (APO) has experienced a recent share price pullback, with the stock down 6.5% in the last week and 20.1% year-to-date, despite strong long-term returns. Simply Wall St's analysis suggests APO is undervalued by 47.1% based on the Excess Returns model and also appears undervalued on an earnings basis, trading below its calculated Fair Ratio. The article encourages investors to use valuation narratives to align their views on future revenues and earnings with a fair value assessment.

feed.title: Is Southwest Airlines (LUV) Share Price Still Attractive After Strong 1 Year Rally?
feed.summary: This article analyzes Southwest Airlines (LUV) share price after a strong one-year rally, assessing its current valuation using Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) and Price-to-Earnings (P/E) ratios. While the DCF model suggests the stock is undervalued by 63.3%, the P/E ratio indicates it is overvalued compared to industry averages and a tailored Fair Ratio. The article also presents "Narratives" for bullish and bearish scenarios to help investors consider various outcomes.

feed.title: Is General Dynamics (GD) Pricing Leave Room After Recent Pullback And Strong Long Term Gains
feed.summary: General Dynamics (GD) has experienced mixed performance recently, with short-term declines but strong long-term gains, prompting an analysis of its current valuation. A Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) analysis suggests the stock is undervalued by 16.0%, with an intrinsic value of approximately $408.27 per share against its current price of $343. Additionally, its P/E ratio of 22.01x is below both the industry average and Simply Wall St's proprietary "Fair Ratio" of 30.07x, further suggesting undervaluation.

feed.title: Molina Healthcare to reaffirm 2026 EPS guidance, sets Q1 release and Investor Day dates
feed.summary: Molina Healthcare (MOH) has reaffirmed its 2026 GAAP diluted EPS guidance of at least $3.20 and adjusted diluted EPS of at least $5.00. The company's senior management will reiterate this guidance at upcoming investor meetings and a TD Cowen conference. Molina has also scheduled its Q1 2026 earnings release for April 22, a conference call for April 23, and an Investor Day for May 8.

feed.title: Abbott Prices $20 Billion Multi-Tranche Notes to Fund Exact Sciences Deal
feed.summary: Abbott has priced a $20 billion multi-tranche senior notes offering, consisting of fixed and floating-rate notes with maturities ranging from 2029 to 2066. The proceeds from this offering, along with other funds, will be used to finance its acquisition of Exact Sciences, repay Exact Sciences' debt, and for general corporate purposes. This financing agreement, made with a syndicate of underwriters including Morgan Stanley and J.P. Morgan, is expected to close on March 9, 2026.

feed.title: Weyerhaeuser launches Strategic Land Solutions segment, targets $1.5B incremental adj. EBITDA by 2030
feed.summary: Weyerhaeuser (WY) has announced the creation of a new segment called Strategic Land Solutions, effective Q1 2026, which consolidates its Real Estate, Energy & Natural Resources operations. The company is targeting an incremental Adjusted EBITDA of $1.5 billion by 2030, with a significant portion expected from climate-related businesses. Additionally, Weyerhaeuser plans substantial capital investments, including a $500 million TimberStrand facility.

feed.title: Honeywell Methanol-to-Jet Selected for European e-SAF plants
feed.summary: Honeywell's Methanol-to-Jet processing technology has been chosen by Verso Energy for seven sustainable aviation fuel (SAF) production plants across Finland, France, and the U.S. Verso plans to leverage Honeywell UOP’s eFining process to convert e-methanol, derived from CO2 and electricity, into e-SAF. This initiative aims to advance the production of power-to-liquid electro-sustainable aviation fuel.

feed.title: Lamar Advertising declares $1.60 quarterly dividend; extends $250M stock and $250M debt buyback programs
feed.summary: Lamar Advertising has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.60 per share, payable on March 31, 2026, to shareholders of record on March 16, 2026. The company also extended its stock repurchase program for $250 million and authorized a debt repurchase program for up to $250 million, both running through September 30, 2027. Aggregate quarterly distributions for 2026 are expected to total at least $6.40 per common share.

feed.title: SBA Communications Corporation Reports Fourth Quarter 2025 Results
feed.summary: SBA Communications Corporation announced its financial results for the fourth quarter of 2025, reporting a significant increase in net income to $370.4 million and robust site leasing revenue growth. The company also provided an optimistic full-year outlook for 2026, projecting strong site leasing revenue and AFFO per share, driven by continued investment from carrier customers and strategic acquisitions, including 2,020 sites from Millicom International. Additionally, SBA Communications declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.25 per share and repurchased 1.1 million shares.

feed.title: Sherwin-Williams’ new HQ overflowing
feed.summary: Sherwin-Williams' new 1.1-million-square-foot headquarters in Downtown Cleveland is already overflowing, necessitating a partial rollback of its Return-To-Office policy for IT staff, allowing them to work remotely. This decision was made to accommodate employees from another downtown building (Higbee) moving into the new HQ. Despite staff reductions and the large capacity of the new tower, the company is spending $500,000 to renovate amenity spaces in the Higbee Building, indicating it will continue to utilize that space for future growth.

feed.title: Invitation Homes to Participate in Citi's 2026 Global Property CEO Conference
feed.summary: Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) announced that its management team will participate in a roundtable discussion at Citi’s 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on March 2, 2026. A live audio webcast of the presentation will be available on the Investor Relations section of the company's website, with a replay accessible until April 2, 2026. Invitation Homes is a prominent single-family home leasing and management company.

feed.title: Invitation Homes to Participate in Citi's 2026 Global Property CEO Conference
feed.summary: Invitation Homes Inc. announced that its management team will hold a roundtable discussion at Citi's 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on March 2, 2026, at 3:35 p.m. Eastern Time. A live audio webcast of the event will be available on the company's Investor Relations website, with a replay accessible until April 2, 2026. Invitation Homes is a leading single-family home leasing and management company.

feed.title: Widow of Pilot Killed in UPS Crash Sues Boeing, GE
feed.summary: The widow of Dana Justin Diamond, a pilot killed in the November 2025 UPS MD-11 crash in Louisville, Kentucky, has filed a wrongful death and negligence lawsuit against Boeing, General Electric, and maintenance provider VT San Antonio Aerospace. The lawsuit alleges that the separation of the aircraft's left engine shortly after takeoff was due to failures by the companies responsible for manufacturing, engine design, and maintenance. This marks the first complaint by surviving family members of the flight's crew, and comes after the FAA banned the MD-11 fleet until inspections are completed, and UPS retired its MD-11 fleet.

feed.title: HCA Healthcare, Inc. to Present at March Conferences
feed.summary: HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE: HCA) is scheduled to present at multiple healthcare conferences throughout March 2026, including events hosted by TD Cowen, Raymond James, Leerink Partners, Barclays, Oppenheimer, and KeyBanc. The company will provide live audio webcasts and related presentation materials on its Investor Relations website. HCA Healthcare is a leading provider of healthcare services, operating 190 hospitals and approximately 2,500 ambulatory sites across 19 states and the UK.

feed.title: Freight locomotive suppliers Wabtec and Progress Rail end antitrust case
feed.summary: Progress Rail, a Caterpillar company, and Wabtec Corporation have announced the settlement of their antitrust case, Progress Rail v. Wabtec. Both companies agreed that the settlement is mutually beneficial for them, their customers, and consumers, avoiding further litigation. The settlement does not involve any admission of liability from either party.

feed.title: Expedia Group Inc. stock outperforms competitors on strong trading day
feed.summary: Expedia Group Inc. (EXPE) saw its stock rise by 6.96% to $217.93 on Thursday, marking its third consecutive day of gains. This performance occurred on a mixed trading day, where the Dow Jones Industrial Average slightly increased, while the S&P 500 Index experienced a decline. The article highlights Expedia's strong showing compared to its competitors.

feed.title: Dover Fueling Solutions Launches ProGauge LR120 Radar to Enhance Accuracy and Visibility in Industrial Applications
feed.summary: Dover Fueling Solutions (DFS) has launched the ProGauge LR120 Radar, a new automatic tank gauging solution designed for industrial applications. This radar offers precise level measurement up to 98.4 feet with 2mm accuracy, especially in challenging environments. Available across EMEA, South America, and Latin America, the LR120 Radar integrates with the ProGauge MagLink LX console, enhancing visibility and inventory management for operators.

feed.title: Prologis to Participate in Industry Conferences
feed.summary: Prologis, Inc. (NYSE: PLD) announced that its chief executive officer, Dan Letter, and chief financial officer, Tim Arndt, will present at upcoming industry conferences. Dan Letter and Tim Arndt will speak at the Citi 2026 Global Property CEO Conference on March 2nd, while Tim Arndt will also present at Raymond James & Associates' 47th Annual Institutional Investors Conference on March 3rd. Both presentations will be available via live audio webcast and subsequent replay on the Prologis investor relations website.

feed.title: Leidos small cruise missile designated AGM-190A by U.S. Air Force
feed.summary: The U.S. Air Force has officially designated the Leidos Small Cruise Missile (SCM) as the AGM-190A, recognizing its role in providing affordable, adaptable stand-off strike capabilities. This 200-pound class weapon system demonstrated a standoff range of over 400 nautical miles during testing and features a modular design for evolving mission requirements. The designation highlights the Air Force's confidence in Leidos' solutions for current and future threats.

feed.title: Dexcom Appoints Rick Osterloh to Board of Directors
feed.summary: DexCom, Inc. announced the appointment of Rick Osterloh, Senior Vice President, Platforms & Devices at Google, to its Board of Directors, effective February 26, 2026. Osterloh brings over two decades of leadership experience in consumer hardware and product operations, including leading Android, Google Play, Chrome, and Google's device portfolio. His expertise in innovation oversight and strategic planning is expected to support Dexcom's mission to improve metabolic health through biosensing technology.

feed.title: Universal Health Services Inc. Cl B stock underperforms Thursday when compared to competitors
feed.summary: Shares of Universal Health Services Inc. Cl B (UHS) fell 11.44% on Thursday, closing at $204.33. This underperformance occurred in a mixed trading session where the Dow Jones Industrial Average rose slightly while the S&P 500 Index declined. The stock is now 17.05% below its 52-week high.

feed.title: HP INC ($HPQ) Former President and CEO 2025 Pay Revealed
feed.summary: HP INC's former President and CEO, Enrique J. Lores, is estimated to have received $23,103,812 in compensation in 2025, which is a 16.2% increase from 2024, according to a recent DEF14A filing. The article also details insider stock transactions, showing multiple sales by executives, and institutional investor activity, with significant changes in holdings by various firms. Additionally, it provides recent analyst ratings and price targets for HPQ stock from several financial institutions.

feed.title: Ninth Circuit Rejects “All-or-Nothing” Approach to D&O Coverage Exclusions—Key Lessons for Policyholders from Las Vegas Sands v. National Union
feed.summary: The Ninth Circuit ruled against an "all-or-nothing" approach to D&O coverage exclusions, stating that insurers cannot deny coverage for an entire lawsuit if only one cause of action falls under an exclusion. The decision in *Las Vegas Sands, LLC v. National Union Fire Insurance Company* emphasizes that each distinct claim must be analyzed separately. This provides policyholders with stronger grounds to challenge blanket denials, especially concerning contractual liability exclusions.

feed.title: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) jumps 19% on takeover-interest report
feed.summary: Caesars Entertainment (CZR) stock surged 19.1% following reports that the company is evaluating takeover interest from multiple parties, including a potential bid from Tilman Fertitta's casino group. This deal chatter is repricing the heavily levered casino operator, even as the company recently reported improved Q4 and full-year 2025 results. Insider trading data shows recent purchases, and several hedge funds have significantly adjusted their positions in CZR.

feed.title: Tinder to Host First-Ever Product Event
feed.summary: Tinder, a Match Group company, announced its first-ever product event, "SPARKS 2026: Start Something New," to unveil upcoming feature updates and its future roadmap. The event will take place on Thursday, March 12th at 2:00 p.m. ET and will feature keynote presentations from Tinder executives, with a live webcast available for investors. The announcement highlights Match Group's continued efforts to innovate its digital technologies for meaningful connections.

feed.title: Henry Schein Names New CEO
feed.summary: Henry Schein Inc. (Nasdaq: HSIC) has appointed Frederick M. Lowery as its new CEO, effective March 2. Lowery, who brings over two decades of healthcare expertise from Thermo Fisher Scientific, replaces Stanley M. Bergman, CEO for 35 years, who will remain chairman. The company highlighted Lowery's experience in scaling complex businesses and his alignment with Henry Schein's strategic plan as it continues to expand its presence in the home medical equipment segment.

feed.title: Federal Realty advances $400M residential development pipeline
feed.summary: Federal Realty Investment Trust (FRT) is advancing a $400 million residential development pipeline, integrating housing above existing retail properties to enhance traffic and retailer performance. These projects, totaling 781 units across multiple markets, are expected to yield around 7%. The company also has entitlements for nearly 3,500 additional units and recently reported strong Q4 2025 financial results.

feed.title: Humana Inc. to Present at the 2026 Leerink Partners Global Healthcare Conference
feed.summary: Humana Inc. announced that its President and CEO, Jim Rechtin, and CFO, Celeste Mellet, will present at the Leerink Partners Global Healthcare Conference on March 10, 2026, at 10:40 a.m. Eastern time. A live audio webcast will be available on Humana's Investor Relations page. Humana is a leading U.S. healthcare company providing insurance and healthcare services.

feed.title: New United Rentals–Procore link puts all jobsite equipment on one screen
feed.summary: United Rentals and Procore Technologies have announced a strategic partnership and their first telematics integration. This collaboration allows United Rentals' equipment data to be seamlessly imported into Procore's Resource Management solution, enhancing jobsite visibility and simplifying equipment management for shared customers. The integration aims to bridge the "resource gap" in construction by providing a unified view of equipment, labor, and materials, supporting AI-driven recommendations for optimized resource deployment and increased productivity.

feed.title: Lamar targets at least $6.40 a share in 2026, extends $500M buybacks
feed.summary: Lamar Advertising Company (Nasdaq: LAMR) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.60 per share, with total 2026 distributions expected to reach at least $6.40 per share. The company also extended its stock repurchase program by $250 million and authorized a $250 million debt repurchase program, both through September 30, 2027. This move emphasizes shareholder returns, aligning with historical patterns that have seen a positive market response to similar announcements.

feed.title: Everest Group Announces Dividend
feed.summary: Everest Group, Ltd. announced that its Board of Directors has declared a dividend of $2.00 per common share. This dividend is payable on or before March 27, 2026, to shareholders of record as of March 13, 2026. Everest Group is a global underwriting leader in property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions.

feed.title: Android, Pixel and Fitbit leader Rick Osterloh joins Dexcom board
feed.summary: DexCom, Inc. (NASDAQ: DXCM) has appointed Rick Osterloh, Senior Vice President of Platforms & Devices at Google, to its Board of Directors, effective February 26, 2026. Osterloh, known for his leadership in consumer hardware and platform strategy, oversees Android, Google Play, Chrome, and Google's Devices and Services Portfolio, including Pixel phones and Fitbit wearables. His extensive experience in innovation and strategic planning is expected to support Dexcom's mission to advance metabolic health through biosensing technology.

feed.title: New Dover tank radar offers 2mm accuracy for industrial sites
feed.summary: Dover Fueling Solutions (NYSE: DOV) has launched the ProGauge LR120 Radar, an automatic tank gauging (ATG) device designed for industrial applications in EMEA and Latin America. This new radar offers precise level measurement up to 98.4 ft with 2mm accuracy, a narrow beam for obstructed tanks, and compliance for hazardous dust environments. The LR120 Radar enhances visibility and inventory management, integrating seamlessly with the ProGauge MagLink LX console family.

feed.title: AvalonBay Communities Announces 2026 Annual Meeting Details
feed.summary: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. announced that its 2026 Annual Meeting of Stockholders will be held virtually on Wednesday, May 20, 2026, at 10:00 A.M. Eastern Time. Stockholders of record as of March 23, 2026, will be entitled to vote and attend the meeting online. Detailed information regarding participation will be provided in the Company’s upcoming Proxy Statement.

feed.title: Molina Healthcare Announces First Quarter 2026 Earnings Release and Conferences Call Dates and Investor Day Meeting
feed.summary: Molina Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE: MOH) announced it will release its first-quarter 2026 earnings after market close on Wednesday, April 22, 2026, followed by a conference call and webcast on Thursday, April 23, 2026, at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The company will also host its 2026 Investor Day meeting on Friday, May 8, 2026, starting at 9:30 a.m. Eastern Time, with a live webcast available on its investor relations website.

feed.title: Albemarle Announces Quarterly Common Stock Dividend
feed.summary: Albemarle Corporation has announced its board of directors declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.405 per share, totaling an annualized rate of $1.62. The dividend is scheduled to be paid on April 1, 2026, to shareholders recorded as of March 13, 2026. Albemarle, a global leader in essential resources, regularly communicates company information through its website.

feed.title: Allegion plc: The Boring-Sounding Stock Hiding a Smart-Home Power Play
feed.summary: Allegion plc, a global access-control heavyweight known for brands like Schlage smart locks, is positioned as a smart-home and smart-building infrastructure play. While not a flashy "meme stock," it offers steady cash flow and growing demand from connected security solutions, particularly in the US market. Investors see it as a "picks-and-shovels" investment in smart cities and hybrid workspaces, balancing traditional hardware with digital access control.

feed.title: KKR to Present at the 2026 RBC Capital Markets Financial Institutions Conference
feed.summary: KKR & Co. Inc. announced that its Chief Financial Officer, Robert H. Lewin, will present at the 2026 RBC Capital Markets Financial Institutions Conference on March 11, 2026, at 9:20 AM ET. A live webcast of the presentation will be available on KKR's Investor Center website, with a replay available shortly after the event for those unable to listen live. KKR is a global investment firm offering alternative asset management, capital markets, and insurance solutions.

feed.title: Inventiva to Participate in Four Upcoming March Investor Conferences
feed.summary: Inventiva, a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company, announced its leadership will participate in four investor conferences in March 2026. The company will hold one-on-one meetings and presentations at the TD Cowen, Leerink Global, Barclays Global, and UBS Biotech conferences. Inventiva focuses on developing lanifibranor, an oral therapy for metabolic dysfunction-associated steatohepatitis (MASH), currently in a pivotal Phase 3 clinical trial.
